text:
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uSNJFGITta8|Creating and Deploying Slackbots with Unison Cloud>

This video guides you through creating a Slackbot in Unison and deploying it to Unison Cloud, starting with a simple example and finishing with a ChatGPT bot.

elements.text: Creating and Deploying Slackbots with Unison Cloud
